headline: New 'LinkPro' Linux Rootkit Uses eBPF for Stealth and Remote Activation
twitter_post: Stealthy new Linux rootkit 'LinkPro' discovered! 🐧 It uses eBPF to hide itself and is activated by a network "magic packet." 🪄 Attackers are abusing kernel-level tech to evade detection. #Linux #Malware #Rootkit #eBPF #CyberSecurity
notes: ✅ Good! 232 chars, has emojis (🐧🪄), but has 5 hashtags - reduce to 2-3

headline: Two CVSS 10.0 Flaws in Red Lion RTUs Allow Full Industrial Control
twitter_post: 🚨 CRITICAL ICS ALERT 🚨 Two CVSS 10.0 vulnerabilities found in Red Lion industrial RTUs. Chaining them allows unauthenticated RCE with root access. 🏭 This could give attackers full control of critical infrastructure. Patch now! #ICS #OTsecurity #Vulnerability #CyberSecurity

headline: Qilin Ransomware Gang Claims Flurry of Attacks on Global Organizations
twitter_post: 🔥 Qilin ransomware is on a rampage! The group has claimed a string of new victims in the US, France, and Africa, hitting insurance, healthcare, and government sectors. Their leak site is growing daily. #Ransomware #Qilin #CyberAttack #ThreatIntel
notes: ⚠️ 246 chars (3 over) + 4 hashtags - minor trim needed

headline: Ransomware Groups Exploiting Flaw in Rapid7's Velociraptor Tool, CISA Warns
twitter_post: ⚠️ CISA KEV ALERT ⚠️ Ransomware gangs are actively exploiting a flaw (CVE-2025-6264) in Rapid7's Velociraptor forensics tool to take over endpoints. It's a living-off-the-land attack. Check your configs & patch now! #CyberSecurity #Ransomware #Vulnerability #CISA

headline: UK's NCSC Reports Record 204 "Nationally Significant" Cyberattacks in Past Year
twitter_post: 📈 UK cyberattacks skyrocket! The @NCSC's 2025 Annual Review reveals a record 204 "nationally significant" incidents, more than double last year. Ransomware, China & North Korea are top threats. 🇬🇧 #CyberSecurity #NCSC #ThreatIntel #Ransomware #UK
notes: ⚠️ 246 chars (3 over) + 5 hashtags - minor trim + reduce hashtags

headline: Over 13 Million Airline Customers' Data Leaked in Breach of Third-Party Provider
twitter_post: ✈️ MAJOR DATA BREACH ✈️ Over 13M customers of Vietnam Airlines & Qantas affected. Hacker group "Scattered LAPSUS$ Hunters" claims to have breached a 3rd-party provider. Names, emails, DOBs leaked. Change your passwords! #DataBreach #Aviation #CyberSecurity #Qantas

headline: Chinese APT 'Jewelbug' Targets Russian IT Firm in Suspected Supply Chain Attack
twitter_post: Geopolitical Intrigue! 🇨🇳➡️🇷🇺 Chinese APT 'Jewelbug' breached a Russian IT firm in a 5-month campaign. Researchers suspect a supply chain attack, with data exfiltrated to Yandex Cloud to evade detection. #CyberSecurity #APT #ThreatIntel #China #Russia
notes: ⚠️ 251 chars (8 over) + 5 hashtags - minor trim + reduce hashtags

headline: Microsoft Revokes 200+ Certificates to Cripple Rhysida Ransomware Campaign
twitter_post: ✅ Microsoft strikes back! Over 200 code-signing certs used by the Rhysida ransomware group (Vanilla Tempest) have been revoked. 🛡️ The group was signing fake MS Teams installers to target healthcare & education. #Ransomware #CyberSecurity #Microsoft #Rhysida

headline: Patch Now: Microsoft Fixes 170+ Flaws, Including Four Actively Exploited Zero-Days
twitter_post: 📢 CRITICAL PATCH TUESDAY 📢 Microsoft's October update fixes 170+ flaws, including 4 zero-days actively exploited in the wild! 💥 Windows Privilege Escalation & Secure Boot bypass bugs are being used by attackers now. Patch immediately! #PatchTuesday #ZeroDay #CyberSecurity

headline: Nation-State Actor Steals F5 Source Code, Triggering CISA Emergency Directive
twitter_post: 🚨 CISA EMERGENCY DIRECTIVE 🚨 Nation-state actor steals F5 source code, creating "imminent risk." Federal agencies ordered to patch all BIG-IP devices immediately. This is a major supply chain threat. #CyberSecurity #SupplyChainAttack #F5 #CISA #Infosec
